price: 48. Bazui bango nyoso mibale ete bazali bato ya lokuta, mpe bazuamaki(2) kati ya baye babebisamaki. buku mpo tango mosusu bakokambama.
footnotes: 2  Bazuamaki: Elakisi: Ba oyo bazuaki Mûssa na Háruna lokuta.

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.
